bship.logic.Player

    • Uses of Player in bship.logic

      Methods in bship.logic that return Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player Player.getOpponent() 
      Methods in bship.logic that return types with arguments of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Player> BattleShipServer.getBattleshipPlayers()
      Getter for all the BattleShip players, i. e., the ones that are registered on the server, despite of being online or offline.
      java.util.ArrayList<Player> BattleShipServer.getInGamePlayers()
      A getter method for the in game players.
      java.util.ArrayList<Player> BattleShipServer.getInLobbyPlayers()
      Returns an ArrayList containing all players that are currently in lobby in the server, i. e., the players that are waiting for players to invite them or waiting to be invited to a game.
      java.util.ArrayList<Player> BattleShipServer.getOnlinePlayers()
      Returns an ArrayList containing wall the players that are currently online on the server.
      Methods in bship.logic with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BattleShipServer.addInGamePlayer(Player player)
      Informs that a player has entered in a game.
      boolean BattleShipServer.canGameBeInitiated(Player player1, Player player2)
      Checks if the game can be initiated by checking if both players are in state ReadyForGame.
      void BattleShipServer.playerLeftFromLobby(Player player)
      Is called to inform that a certain player has left from the lobby because the server needs to know when a player leaves from lobby.
      void BattleShipServer.sendOnlinePlayersInfoToPlayer(Player player)
      Responsible for sending the names of all players in lobby to a player.
      void Player.setOpponent(Player opponent)
